/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall network=private service="all" \ protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall network=public service="ssh" \ protocol="tcp" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT" \ flags="-m state --state NEW"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add firewall network=public service="all" \ protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="INPUT" \ flags="-m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost chain=INPUT \ flags="-m state --state NEW --source &Kickstart_PublicNetwork;/&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;" \ protocol=tcp service=https action=ACCEPT network=public
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost chain=INPUT \ flags="-m state --state NEW --source &Kickstart_PublicNetwork;/&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;" \ protocol=tcp service=www action=ACCEPT network=public
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost network=public \ output-network=private service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" \ chain="FORWARD" flags="-m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost network=private \ service="all" protocol="all" action="ACCEPT" chain="FORWARD"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost output-network=public \ service="nat" protocol="all" action="MASQUERADE" chain="POSTROUTING"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost network=all service="8649" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block ganglia traffic from non-private interfaces"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost network=all service="3306" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block mysql traffic from non-private interfaces"
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host firewall localhost network=all service="40000" \ protocol="udp" action="REJECT" chain="INPUT" \ comment="block foundation mysql traffic from non-private interfaces"

/opt/rocks/bin/rocks report host firewall localhost | \ /opt/rocks/bin/rocks report script \ attrs="{'Kickstart_PublicNetwork':'&Kickstart_PublicNetwork;', \ 'Kickstart_PublicNetmask':'&Kickstart_PublicNetmask;'}" \ > /tmp/do-firewall.sh
chmod a+x /tmp/do-firewall.sh /tmp/do-firewall.sh
